ProjectTitle: Unraveling the gut virome in black soldier fly larvae (Hermetia illucens) and its interaction with the microbial gut community
InitialFeedbackHistory: 08/07/2022 [REDACTED] you already know which data repository you might use for preservation and sharing? [REDACTED] any of the EBI repositories (www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) be suitable? ENA also gives good checklists for reporting, please take a look if any of these may be a useful metadata standard for your work: www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/browser/checklists. [REDACTED] data for which there is no disciplinary repository you can use KU [REDACTED] RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr).
label: good with suggestions
